name: Take My Life, Please
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Don Payne
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer finds out that he actually won the senior class president election, and he gets an opportunity to find out how his life would have been different if it had happened.
